page.title: 08Farming-A Tickhill Farmer
page.content: The man who lives at{Bagley Farm}has been farming from when he left school.Farming has always been in his family since his grandfather started farming and perhaps his father before that.He has always lived and worked at Bagley Farm since he was a little boy. The farmer has{three people}working for him on his{720 acre}farm.He sometimes gets up at{0730}but at pea-picking time he has to get up at{ {0630}which is very early.Sometimes he has to get up in the middle of the night to help with{lambing}or{calving. The farmers favourite job is using the power harrow because it makes his fields look neat and tidy.And the job he likes least of all,is fetching pea-pickers from a neighbouring town. His{wife}keeps the books and attends to any secretarial work.Farming is a seven day week job.
